Add your review Blogger reviews Bloggers, have you reviewed this restaurant? Add your review to this page. Diner reviews
Diner reviews are sorted by relevance
December 4, 2010 Service and food have stepped up by Amie ( 16 reviews ) I stopped going to Boston Market years ago when it was Rotisserie Grill (or whatever). The food and service sucked and it was expensive. I've rediscovered it. The service is excellent and the staff is friendly. There are also new more affordable menu choices. The Gov. Sq. Blvd. one has become my go to spot when I want a quick knife-and-fork meal. August 22, 2011 Better now then before by Michael ( 9 reviews ) Before they put the table side service in place the service/food was ok I still think they have the best mac and cheese of any restaurant hands down, the noodles aren't ever soggy when I go there. If it's just been made then it's even better. I like the new style of service, they bring it to you, you eat it, they clean it up. Great idea for a"fast"food restaurant. February 19, 2010 Doesn't like it Mobile review by Tracy ( 10 reviews ) Crap service. I stopped eating at Boston Market because no matter which location I vist, the service is horrible and there is always something missing from my order.
